attributes.action: Update JPA, the Armed Forces pay system, to enable important allowances and entitlements to be added to salaries via the supplementary pay run.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As LSA, GYH and ULA were omitted from the supplementary pay run list, sea going personnel will have disrupted and incorrect salary payments.
The above entitlements cannot be paid until the following month unless the ship’s circumstances change before the second Friday of the month.
JPA was introduced to streamline and simplify the pay system, but these omissions are causing chaos and distress to sea going naval personnel and their families.
